name: Topics in Biophysical Chemistry
description: Advanced topics in Physical Chemistry with emphasis on biochemical systems. Spectroscopic methods for (bio) molecular structure determination, including IR, NMR, UV/VIS; colloid chemistry; polymers and bio-polymers, bonding structure and statistical mechanics; physical chemistry of membranes, active transport and diffusion; oscillatory (bio)chemical reactions.
prerequisites: [CHMB20H3 or CHMB23H3] and CHMB21H3 and MATB41H3 and PHYA21H3
